titles.title: To extend patent numbered 5,180,715 for a period of 2 years.
To extend patent numbered 5,180,715 for a period of 2 years.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Requires the Under Secretary of Commerce for Intellectual Property and Director of the United States Patent and Trademark Office to extend the patent numbered 5,180,715 (relating to irrigation of internal bladder surfaces in mammals with sodium pentosanpolysulfate) for two additional years.
